TITLE: Self-made millionaire: Here are 8 things rich people do differently that make them 'ultra wealthy'
SUMMARY: Self-made millionaire Grant Cardone says wealthy people think about money in a completely different way than most Americans. Here are the money rules that helped them get rich.

TITLE: The Fair Tax Act, explained: What to know about the Republican plan for a national sales tax, decentralized IRS
SUMMARY: A group of House Republicans is revisiting the Fair Tax Act, which would replace certain federal taxes with a national sales tax and decentralize the IRS.

TITLE: Rent prices have dropped the most in these 5 U.S. metro areas. Why it's cheaper to rent in many markets
SUMMARY: Despite rising U.S. rental prices, competition is easing in some markets as inventory grows, according to a new report.

TITLE: The outgoing CEO of a giant autos firm had a message for his successor: Don't be like me
SUMMARY: After Akio Toyoda, CEO and president of Toyota, announced he was stepping down on Thursday, he shared his advice to his successor and his business philosophy.

TITLE: Beyoncé, a $100,000-a-night suite and a red carpet of influencers: Dubai basks in its booming economy
SUMMARY: Beyoncé was performing her first live concert in more than four years at a private event for the opening of Atlantis The Royal, a $1.4 billion luxury hotel.

TITLE: China looks past Covid as tourist bookings surge for the Lunar New Year
SUMMARY: People in China are moving past the pandemic and going out to travel, preliminary data for the Lunar New Year holiday show.

TITLE: Here's where mainland Chinese traveled overseas for the Lunar New Year
SUMMARY: Travel booking site Trip.com ranked the top overseas destinations for travelers from mainland China during the first four days of the Lunar New Year holiday.

TITLE: Luxury retailer LVMH is optimistic as it sees Chinese shoppers and tourists returning
SUMMARY: LVMH's cautious optimism echoes positive comments earlier this month from Burberry and Swatch.

TITLE: IRS warns tax refunds may be 'somewhat lower.' With high inflation, that's a 'double whammy' for families, says advisor
SUMMARY: If you're expecting a tax refund, it may be smaller than last year's payment, according to the IRS. Here's why.

TITLE: Bill Gates says no country ‘gets an A’ for its Covid pandemic response—including the U.S.
SUMMARY: Billionaire Microsoft co-founder and health care philanthropist Bill Gates says that no country, from the U.S. to Australia, aced its Covid pandemic response.

TITLE: Oscar-nominated 'Everything Everywhere All At Once' features an IRS ordeal, but here's what really happens in an audit, according to tax pros
SUMMARY: The Oscar-nominated film "Everything Everywhere All at Once" includes a tax audit at an IRS office. But experts say actual IRS exams are not like in the movies.

TITLE: Bill Gates is ‘very optimistic’ about the future: ‘Better to be born 20 years from now...than any time in the past’
SUMMARY: Despite the world's many challenges, Bill Gates says technological and scientific advances will keep improving future generations' quality of life. Here's why.

TITLE: These are the key tax forms you need to file your return — and when to expect them
SUMMARY: Experts say it's critical to get organized with tax forms before filing your 2022 return. Here's how to avoid tax refund delays.

TITLE: Tax filing season has kicked off. Here's how to get a faster refund
SUMMARY: Tax season kicked off for individual filers on Jan. 23, and the deadline for most taxpayers is April 18. Here's how to get a faster tax refund, experts say.

TITLE: Aramco-backed fintech opens bank branch in London to help Muslims invest
SUMMARY: Wahed, an Islamic fintech startup backed by Saudi Aramco and Paul Pogba, debuted its own retail presence in the U.K. Tuesday.

TITLE: Tax season starts with boosted IRS workforce, new technology as agency begins to deploy $80 billion in funding
SUMMARY: Tax season kicked off for individual filers on Monday with a bigger IRS customer service team and enhanced technology, according to Treasury officials.

TITLE: Roth IRA conversion taxes may be trickier than you expect. Here's what to know before filing — or converting funds in 2023
SUMMARY: If you completed a Roth individual retirement account conversion in 2022, your tax return may be complicated. Here's what filers need to know.

TITLE: Mark Cuban used this grocery store hack to get cheap food when he was broke
SUMMARY: Mark Cuban moved to Dallas in his 20s with just $60 in his pocket, so he had to try every money-saving hack he could think of to get by.

TITLE: LeBron James NBA Finals jersey expected to fetch up to $5 million at auction
SUMMARY: Sotheby’s is auctioning a game-worn LeBron James jersey estimated to be valued between $3 million and $5 million.

TITLE: Amid inflation, more middle-class Americans struggle to make ends meet
SUMMARY: Financial well-being is deteriorating overall but middle-class households have been particularly hard hit.

TITLE: Over 200 millionaires urge Davos elite to up taxes on the ultra-rich
SUMMARY: Over 200 millionaires called on the elite attendees of this week’s World Economic Forum in Davos to “tackle extreme wealth” and “tax the ultra-rich.”

TITLE: Where are the safest places to travel in 2023? It depends on how you define 'safe'
SUMMARY: New reports show the "safest" travel destinations vary by whether crime, terrorism, quality of medical care or people's perceptions are analyzed.

TITLE: Gen Z is driving luxury sales as wealthy shoppers get younger
SUMMARY: Analysts and luxury executives say the appeal of luxury brands to ever-younger consumers is tied to a surge in wealth creation over the past few years, along with social media.

TITLE: There's still time to avoid a penalty for fourth-quarter estimated taxes — but the clock is ticking
SUMMARY: There's still time to avoid a penalty if you didn't pay enough taxes in 2022. The deadline for fourth-quarter estimated tax payments is Jan. 17.

TITLE: Chinese travelers are returning to Singapore, but a full recovery is not expected this year
SUMMARY: Singapore is welcoming travelers from China, but tourist numbers may return to just 30%-60% of pre-pandemic numbers by year-end.

TITLE: The richest 1% of people amassed almost two-thirds of new wealth created in the last two years, Oxfam says
SUMMARY: Since 2020, the richest 1% of people have accumulated close to two-thirds of all new wealth created around the world, according to a new report from Oxfam.

TITLE: India's wedding season is here, but for many it's no longer the bigger, the better
SUMMARY: Millennial couples in India are opting for more intimate wedding celebrations, but costs for food, venues and decorations remain high.

TITLE: Mark Cuban: ‘People thought I was an idiot’ for launching the company I sold for billions
SUMMARY: Mark Cuban says skeptics laughed in 1995 when he launched Broadcast.com, the streaming audio startup that eventually sold to Yahoo for $5.7 billion.

TITLE: Are you buying 'too much car'? Americans' obsession with pricey options like touch screens is causing an affordability crisis
SUMMARY: With the lucrative luxury segment in such high demand, carmakers are upgrading their lineups and scaling back on less expensive cars.

TITLE: The condo king of Miami bets his new Fisher Island luxury project can weather a recession
SUMMARY: Jorge Perez and his Related Group are behind the 10-story, 50-unit Fisher Island project that boasts a sell-out price of $1.2 billion.
